attributes.action: Fathers losing their rights due to mothers deception of not putting fathers name on birth certificate
attributes.additional_details: Fathers in this day in age should not lose rights with their kids because mother has lied to them about their name being put on the birth certificate. I had no idea how it worked and in this day and age in this country this should not be a load to happen, please help me get the law changed and this rectified as both parants deserve this basic right. Thankyou.
